186020227.review: wonderful game! lots of content! i thought it was a bit too easy so i tried doing the boss rush with 4 hp and no items on newgame+ and now my mental health is in ruin all around really good!

186012554.review:
какой ебанат придумал сделать в 4 части игру в карты
хоть одну игру назовите, где это была хорошая идея и в тех карточный стол работает сбалансировано и честно, а здесь чтобы выиграть в партию ты хоть стой, хоть падай у тебя это не выйдет не утратив рассудок и желание играть в этот откровенный бред)
я натуральна сижу час против раба короля рыблок и потерял 6000 золота на возвращение игровых карт, которые я получил абсолютно честно и выходит КАДР у которого карты в руке появляются для того чтобы победить в 100% случаев, а победа его происходит в момент, когда ты мог бы выиграть, но ты просто нахуй послан, ведь тогда будет слишком интересно исследовать оставшуюся игру и не дропать её после этого психадела и  особенно мне нравится, что установленные правила не нарушаются никем КРОМЕ ВСЕХ ВРАГОВ СХВАТКИ БЛЯТЬ! подходит 2 час игры за столом и чувак фэн рыблок уже 6 раз выигрывает забывая про то что двойная стрелка не имеет права двигать двойную стрелку, что карта без символов и одной стрелкой не может вытолкнуть карту в смертельную зону, но лол, это же не игрок, который хочет поиграть, а не страдать

загадки жаблинга-брейн рот, нужно собрать 2 изумруда, там есть 2 решения решил 1 способом-молодец, решил 2 способом-проигрыш, почему, да хуй его знает, разраб еблан просто

я пережил 3 части, прошёл их на все достижения, ДА Я ВСЕ 3 ЧАСТИ ПРОШЁЛ ЗА ПОЛТОРА ЧАСА, но здесь...
у меня хватит сил, но называть это игрой, а не какой-то клоунадой будет невозможно

185758648.review:
Tüm arc'ları bitirerek söylüyorum,çok iyi. Genel bakacak olursak piksel art'ı aşırı detaylı değil ama retro havası içerdiğinden çok nostaljik bir havası var. Mekanikleri güzel ama bazı yerleri öyle zorluyor ki saç baş yoldurur. Müzikleri çok eğlenceli ve hareketli. Npc'leri de öyle, taverna dansçısını çok sevdim özellikle :D
Hikayelerin birbirleriyle bağlı olup dallanmasını çok beğendim çok iyi iş çıkarmışlar kesinlikle. 4 arc'ı kısaca özetleyecek olursam ilki standart,Super Mario kalitesinde ama güzel kesinlikle,2.si yanılmıyorsam simyacıydı ki bence oyunun en zor arc'ı budur,oynayabiliyorsanız en son bunu oynayın. Ama güzel de bir sonu var söylim ;)
Arc 3 hikayesel olarak kişiye göre değişir ama bence oynanış olarak en zevkli ve başarılı kısımdı. Son arc olan kral arc'ı da aynı şekilde. Üst üste oynayıp bitirdiğim için son arc baydı biraz beni ama kart oyunu mekaniği çok zevkli ve başarılı olmuş kesinlikle,oyun içinde oyun yapmış adamlar daha ne olsun. Bu oyuna da güzelinden bir 8/10 veriyorum hocam,oynayabiliyorsanız muhakkak oynayın.

185463853.review:
Very very good indie game, for the content you get and if you intend to play throught all the main campains the game is amazing for its price.

Shovel of hope, Specter of torment, Plague of shadows and King of cards are all excellent campains. If you like your retro style platformers like old school mario its kind of like that but just alot more gameplay added upon that. 

It can get frustrating at times because the game overall is not easy pits are asses and some enemies can bullshit you into death. But its very well worth it even casually to play through the campains because it's really cool to see how each story intertwines with each other. And some twists are really unexpected atleast it was for me.

The only game mode that is "bad" is showdown. Like this game mode is so long if your trying to unlock everything and it is so repetitive that it just becomes annoying. Your basically playing super smash bros but with shovel knight characters which is fine but if we're comparing to the other campains its lackluster at best. 

But most importantly,
The bigger the explosion the better the alchemist!.

185235311.review: Good game, def worth if the game drops to twenty dollars in any sale. Each play through is 5-10 hours and there are 4 stories. My favorite was Spector knight as it was the most fluid movement and story was by far the best. Liked the Plague knight as well. All solid stories and gameplay change ups. Only critique of the game is the one shot kills via hazards. Makes it feel necessary to run the armor set that makes so you don't die in one shot the entire time. Even if you go with the analog answer of get good, still makes this armor set far better than the other ones when you play for the first time. Loved the bosses for the most part and the enemies were varied enough that each level was fresh, no real blot levels. Overall solid experience with no large drawbacks.

185070325.review:
Is it "good" to buy a game you love three times?

That's entirely subjective!

Pros:

Supporting the Developers: Buying a game multiple times directly supports the developers, allowing them to continue making great games.
Playing on Different Platforms: Perhaps you bought it for different consoles (Switch, PC, etc.) to enjoy it on the go or with different friends.
Collecting Physical Copies: Some people enjoy collecting physical copies of their favorite games.
Cons:

Cost: Buying the same game multiple times can be expensive.
Ultimately, if you genuinely enjoy Shovel Knight and find yourself coming back to it, then buying it multiple times is a personal choice that you're happy with.

Have you tried all the different campaigns in Treasure Trove? If not, I highly recommend checking them out! Each campaign offers a unique perspective on the story and a different gameplay experience.

185069841.review:
4 amazing games in 1 legendary treasure trove? yes please. I love shovel knight. I've beat 3 of the games, working on the last one now. I Highly recommend shovel knight to anyone who loves a good platformer. if this deal was just "Shovel of hope" (shovel knights game) it would be worth the price but it also comes with 3 more games for some of the other characters. The other playable characters that each get their own game are plague knight, specter knight and king knight. Each character has it's own unique controls, story, abilities, and each game is different enough to keep things fresh. In king knights game there is a mini game you play which is actually a lot of fun too, it's called joustus. 

pick it up if you like platformers, you won't regret it.

185005587.review: Shovel Knight is a pretty feisty trick. It presents itself as if it's a return to a more low key, humble time in video games, with it's 8 bit visuals and 3 button action. In secret, it is a perfectly assembled, delightfully complete video game, with a AAA level of content, and one of the greatest soundtracks ever devised. Its alternate campaigns hold so much unique charm and mechanics, that it feels as if the game will never stop impressing you. I know it never stopped impressing me.

184584037.review: Shovel knight é uma saga maravilhosa, jogos incríveis com uma gameplay gostosa e uma história bem divertida, recomendo demais esse jogo e mesmo que a maioria das campanhas tenham muita similaridade com a primeira ainda assim vale a pena pela mudança drástica na gameplay de cada cavaleiro e pela história que difere e expande o universo, caso você que está lendo isso for louco que nem eu e quiser platinar, desejo a você boa sorte porque é dificil para um caralho e bem estressante.

184548052.review:
Ai, ai, essa review vai ser longa

Shovel of Hope: Uma ótima campanha baseada em Mega Man, quase não tive problemas com erros no level design, a dificuldade sempre se manteve de forma natural e progressiva, todos os personagens são um poço imenso de personalidade e carisma, os diálogos são muito bem escritos e a história é incrivelmente boa, por mais que não seja um foco
Nota 9/10

Plague of Shadows: Com certeza a melhor jogabilidade dentre as 4 campanhas, controlar o Plague Knight é supreendentemente divertido, a mecânica de criar bombas é algo surreal e todas as fases se encaixam com a proposta do personagem, mesmo tendo mudanças mínimas no level design
Nota 8/10

Specter of Torment: L.I.N.D.O. Trilha sonora mais do que excelente, gameplay que beira a perfeição e uma das melhores histórias que um jogo focado em gameplay poderia apresentar, todos os caprichos são extremamente divertidos, o gráfico é impecável e toda a dificuldade se mantêm razoável até mesmo nos desafios mais complicados da campanha
Nota 10/10

King of Cards: A melhor e mais completa campanha das 4. Um protagonista totalmente odiável, mas que você não consegue odiar, um humor incrível, fases mais curtas e melhores, uma tonelada de personagens, cada um com o seu carisma único e o Joustus, aahhh, o Joustus. O melhor jogo de cartas que um game poderia implementar
Nota ∞/10

Nota final 9/10

184510593.review: good game but wish that there was online mode

184486527.review:
For more than a decade Shovel Knight has stood as "the face" of indie games, and revisiting it nearly a decade later shows that the game is absolutely deserving of that title. I originally bought into the game during a dry spell of games for the Wii U and loved it as the closest an indie game has gotten to feeling like classic Mega Man, and in the years since, the game has massively evolved beyond what it was at launch, and all for the better. Since beating the game, Shovel Knight became a collection of separate campaigns featuring villains of the original story at no extra cost, added in character customization, fully implemented 2 player co-op,  Steam Deck Verified, and 2 side modes with completely separate gameplay through Showdown and King of Cards. All of these major additions make the price of the game easily warranted, ESPECIALLY during a sale where the game is discounted. 

New additions onto a game that had amazing music, gameplay, tight platforming, and no BS. Shovel Knight is a game that respects your time and investment, and one of the "must-have" games on any platform, Steam included. While countless indie games will come and go, it stand proudly among a rare crowd of games like Undertale, Cave Story, and Super Meat Boy (among others) as one of the most defining AND influential indie games of all time.

183929358.review:
Simplesmente a melhor saga de jogos que joguei, além de ter conteúdo para um caramba. é recheado de níveis, bosses, coletáveis e uma história incrível, gostaria de destacar 3 pontos que mais me fascinaram nesse jogo; a lore, a ideia de podermos controlar os ''vilões'' da campanha principal é muito funcional e impacta diretamente na nossa visão sobre os personagens, enriquecendo a história e o enredo da trama; gráficos, sendo um jogo cujo a primeira campanha foi lançada em 2014, a volta dos gráficos pixelados eram inovadores e eles souberam fazer muito bem; o último e mais top desse jogo na minha opinião é a trilha sonora, cara, nunca gostei tanto de uma ost como essa, literalmente todas as musicas são ótimas, sem exceção, Jake Kaufman mandou bem demais na criação de músicas, aprecie elas enquanto joga as fases (se conseguir) de todos os jogos que vem nesse conjunto os meus favoritos são plague of shadows (não tem como o plague e a mona são muito bonitinhos juntos), king of cards (gosto muito de jogos de cartas, aí você junta um jogo de plataforma com temática medieval e card games, não tem como dar errado), specter of torment (é o jogo que contém a melhor lore entre todos, fala da história de um dos personagens mais legais e misteriosos da saga), por último mas não menos importante a campanha principal, o shovel of hope (não me levem a mal, o jogo é maravilhoso e muito bom, foi oque deu início a tudo e gosto dele assim como os demais, mas entre todos os outros acho que ele fica meio esquecido já que os outros tem mais coisas, mas isso não o torna ruim). nessa análise eu desconsiderei o showdown mas ele é tão bom quanto.
espero ter te ajudado a avaliar o jogo para saber se você deve ou não comprar, para mim valeu muito a pena.

183566661.review:
[h1]最好玩最有设计缝合最为成功的独游之一[/h1]
《Shovel Knight： Treasure Trove》是独立游戏领域中极具影响力和成功的作品之一，充分展现了系列作的独特魅力与设计智慧。该游戏不仅以其出色的玩法绝妙的关卡设计和丰富的内容吸引了大量玩家，还通过多个外传作品《苦痛幽灵》、《卡牌之王》和《暗影瘟疫》，为玩家提供了全新的[b]视角[/b]和[b]叙事体验[/b]。

[h2]系列外传的魅力[/h2]
[u]这些外传由几个Boss角色为主角，各自引入[b]不同风格[/b]的叙事方式，并通过[b]交错的时间线[/b]和[b]明暗线[/b]来叙事，增强了整个系列的联动性。[/u]这样的设计不仅丰富了玩家的游戏体验，还让整个世界观显得更加深邃和连贯。有很多比较有趣的联动（包含剧透）：[spoiler]多诺万的卢恩的吊坠代表着对友人的承诺，在前传《苦痛幽灵》末尾被幽灵骑士藏在巫妖庭院的角落。而在暗线《暗影瘟疫》里被瘟疫骑士找到当做没用的东西卖给了流浪商人换取化学炸药。最后在正传《希望之铲》篇章被流浪商人卖给了铲子骑士当做相当强力的相位吊坠使用。
又如黑暗侍僧在《苦痛幽灵》看守传送门，直到黑暗利兹的顶替和女巫的抛弃，最后引领幽灵骑士打败黑暗利兹后转为侍奉苹果鳟国王，途中跟随见证国王骑士的崛起，最后变成了铲子骑士的苹果侍僧。
舞女在《希望之铲》里希望有人打败幽灵，是因为《苦痛幽灵》篇里幽灵骑士对于舞女的舞蹈不屑一顾。
国王在《希望之铲》里希望有人打败国王骑士，是因为《国王骑士》里国王骑士对大家的背叛（不背叛我觉得很可能会传位给他）。[/spoiler]

[h3]希望之铲（一心一意救圆盾骑士的正义骑士）[/h3]
最常规的能力最有数值的跳跃和击退距离，[u]铲子骑士以其简单而高效的操作为主打，通过精确的控件赋予玩家更强的掌控感[/u]。但是道具的隐藏妙用如金币跳等也是最多的，是看起来不强但是谁都能打过的最强英雄。
缺点：个人觉得此篇的地形杀最为严重，角色性能不同与那三位能空中跳跃，在正常一周目游玩没获得一些道具时也注定除了骚操作外很多钱捡不到。

[h3]苦痛幽灵（遵守诺言保护友人儿子的赎罪骑士）[/h3]
最好上手的性能怪物，就算手残也能玩得很帅。[u]其玩法紧紧依靠关卡机制的设计，根据关卡的机关与怪物进行技能能力的有机结合[/u]，而游戏[b]超绝的关卡设计[/b]正好为其体验保驾护航。
缺点：一出现斜线时攻击就会飞跃斩，这个导致很多地方的操作比较固定，建议是在空中同时按住相应方向再攻击才发动。再者就是部分地方的爬墙过于敏感，可以适当优化相应地形的判定优化体验。

[h3]卡牌之王（只为王位奋斗的智勇双全骑士[strike]？[/strike]）[/h3]
欢乐的喜剧，可以选择游玩的卡牌机制，特色的全新boss，以及特别为国王骑士改造的地图，这些使国王骑士篇的评价注定不会低。
他的机制属于是[b]难上手易精通[/b]的类型，一但适应能力其实更多的就是根据地图的具体设计来使用道具，和他的闯关逻辑与幽灵骑士类似是通过关卡的具体分布从而使用能力来推动进度。
缺点：翻滚过于难用，平常的战斗会影响操作，那个专属挑战也把难用和鸡肋体现得淋漓紧致。

[h3]暗影瘟疫（默默计划超级力量只为心上人的内向骑士）[/h3]
最有剧情的一集，和“暗影”相符故事发生在正传同一时刻的暗影中，在玩瘟疫骑士的途中会时不时遇到代表正义的铲子骑士，以此会了解正传当中很多不知道的另一面。
瘟疫骑士的操作最为特殊，他有着[u]最高的操作上限和复杂的道具组合以及与其爆炸物相对应的疯狂的输出[/u]，在强调操作的同时也强调资源分配的重要性。
缺点：玩具炸弹和配件过多，跳跃的时候很难处理平行的怪物（这点在旋翼骑士很严重），最主要的是击退距离过大（独一档的特性）。

[h2]引人入胜的音乐和节奏[/h2]
在音乐和节奏方面，《Shovel Knight： Treasure Trove》同样表现出色。游戏的原声带充满了复古魅力，[u]每首曲目都恰如其分地补充了游戏的氛围[/u]，为玩家创造了[b]沉浸的游戏体验[/b]。[u]音乐的节奏与游戏中的动作完美契合[/u]，使得玩家在战斗和探索中都能感受到振奋的节奏感。

[h2]量大管饱的超大体量[/h2]
值得注意的是，游戏提供了丰富多样的终极对决和挑战模式，这在图像和内容仅有几百MB的情况下实现了出乎意料的深度与广度。每个角色的能力与操作方式各不相同，使得玩家在不同角色间切换时能体验到新鲜感。
在一周目后会有new game+,此时游戏内容会更具挑战性并略有不同比如可以切换各个boss与自己的性别等。

[h2]绝妙的关卡设计[/h2]
关卡设计是这款游戏的另一个精髓所在。[u]巧妙设置的隐藏墙壁、[b]跨关[/b]的存在联动的上下连接、有趣的机关和技能互动，[/u]使得每个关卡都倍感新鲜。这样的设计不仅提升了探索的乐趣，同时也鼓励玩家在游戏中不断尝试与发现。

[h2]个人的建议[/h2]
游戏采用8bit复古风格，其中音乐美术都可圈可点，但是很多古早机制至少对于大部分人是很不友好的，比如[b]“即死陷阱”[/b]与“[b]金币可能掉落到几乎不可能捡到的地方”[/b]，这些确实是老游戏的特色其实也有其好的地方。但是[u]建议这方面可以设置对应的开关，想体验原汁原味的玩家可以开启，普通玩家也没必要为此受罪。[/u]
[h2]总结[/h2]
在我个人的游戏评价中，《Shovel Knight： Treasure Trove》绝对有资格跻身T0级别。推荐给热爱[b]横版类闯关游戏[/b]和[b]复古风格[/b]的玩家们，这款游戏能为他们提供卓越的游戏体验与难忘的冒险旅程。（[u]强烈建议：游玩中不要太在意掉落的金币，实际上打完会发现不怎么缺金币，本人也是在一次次破防逐渐淡漠后发现：不要在意金币掉落，体验感便会大幅上升。[/u]）
